main.name: Nithin Pingili
main.bio: I am a Junior Software Developer at Anica and currently working on a property management web application. I have experience creating web applications for desktop and mobile using React. Also, I have deployed the web applications on Amazon Web Services using Docker and GitLab CI/CD pipelines. I have a strong inclination towards creating full-stack web applications using modern technologies.
main.contactmessage: If you have any questions regarding my work or if you think there is an opportunity available for me, please contact me using the form below.

education.school: The University of Texas at Austin
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Coursework: Algorithms, Cloud Computing, Computer Architecture, Computer Networks, Data Structures, Modern Web Applications, Operating Systems, Software Engineering, Computer Security

work.title: Anica Inc.
work.description: Developed a property management web application that allows landlords and real estate professionals to track leases, residents, and maintenance tasks as well as collect rent and manage finances to reduce costs and streamline operations.

projects.title: Trading Cards
projects.category: A web application for Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Cards

projects.title: Food Me Once
projects.category: Website designed to look into the issue of food security in the United States
